> ### Overview
><br />
> **Duration**: 2 hours
><br />
><br />
>
> **Objectives**
>
> 1) Describe the purpose and use of each pane in the RStudio IDE
> 2) Assign data to a variable
> 3) Call functions
> 4) Understand R data structures
> 5) Subsetting lists
>
><br />

## Before starting the lesson
To facilitate the timeliness of the lesson, please ensure that you have these 
programs installed on your computer.

* Latest version of R
    - [For Windows](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/)
    - [For Mac](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/macosx/)
    - [For Linux](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/linux/)
        
* [Latest version of RStudio](https://rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/)
